title: Whitty
desc: An ex-rockstar who was part of a small band with an old friend, but it fell apart after a failed deal with the Dearests as they put a hit on the two. The duo tried their hardest to escape the hitmen sent after them, they couldn't get away for long...as Whitty's friend was caught by a stray bullet, dying in his arms. Whitty went off-radar since.

cData.desc: Whitty Style Revisions by FifLeo & Offbi
Whitty Week Sprites Sketch by EllisBros
Non FNF Whitty Design for fun by Offbi (original Whitty by Sock.clip)
Cover Art for Boom Bash by squishyzumorizu
